00032     template <class T>
00033     class Proxy {
00034     public:
00035         Proxy(T* t):mImpl(t){}
00036 
00040         T*& pImpl() {
00041             if (ProxySettings::DEBUG_CHECK_IS_VALID){
00042                 if (mImpl==NULL){
00043                     ProxySettings::DEBUG_OSTREAM << "<Warning> Accessing invalid proxy! (Proxy@" << this << ")";
00044                 }
00045             }
00046             return mImpl;
00047         }

00053             if (ProxySettings::DEBUG_CHECK_IS_VALID){
00054                 if (mImpl==NULL){
00055                     ProxySettings::DEBUG_OSTREAM << "<Warning> Accessing invalid proxy! (Proxy@" << this << ")";
00056                 }
00057             }
00058             return *mImpl;
00059         }
00060 
00064         bool isValid() const {return mImpl!=NULL;}
00065 
00069         void invalidate(){mImpl = NULL;}
